name: False Info
description: This is for viral false information regarding public affairs.

name: Believers Hates
description: This is for religion-based hateful content. The contents can be considered hateful when the target is the believer, not the institution.

name: Gender Hates
description: This for gender-based hate and bullying.

name: Incite Violence
description: This is for content that incite violence of any type.

name: Elec Violence
description: This is for contents that might lead to electoral violence.
